channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Fred Again.., Skepta, & Plaqueboymax Debut New Song And Stream Brooklyn Pop-Up On Twitch
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to vibe with Fred Again.., Skepta, & Plaqueboymax on Twitch! 🎤🎧 Check out the new song and pop-up stream now! #MusicNews 🌟

item.title: Dean Johnson Announces New Album I Hope We Can Still Be Friends: Hear “Before You Hit The Ground”
item.description: 🎶✨ Prepare for some serious feels! Dean Johnson's new album 'I Hope We Can Still Be Friends' dropping soon. Check out "Before You Hit The Ground" now! 🔥🎧 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Kitt Wakeley Wins His Second Grammy
item.description: 🏆🎶 Double Grammy win for the talented Kitt Wakeley! Let's keep the celebration going! 🎉 #Grammys #KittWakeley #MusicNews

item.title: Motion City Soundtrack Announce First Album in a Decade: ‘The Most Important Record of Our Career’
item.description: 🚀 Motion City Soundtrack is back with 'The Most Important Record of Our Career'! Who's ready to rock out with them? 🎶 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Addison Rae Announces Tour
item.description: 🎉 Dance your way into summer with Addison Rae's tour announcement! 💃 Let's groove together! #AddisonRae #MusicNews 🎶
